text: Myriam Fares(born May 3, 1983) is a Lebanese singer, actress, dancer, and entertainer.http://virtualexpo.world/ She was born to a Maronite Christian family in Sidon District.https://www.alquds.co.uk/%D9%85%D9%8A%D8%B1%D9%8A%D8%A7%D9%85-%D9%81%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%B3-%D8%B9%D8%A7%D8%B4%D8%AA-%D8%AD%D9%8A%D8%A7%D8%A9-%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%A6%D8%B3%D8%A9-%D8%A8%D8%B3%D8%A8%D8%A8-%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AF%D9%87/ She has been targeted by extremists for trolling in 2015 for celebrating Easter. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Lebanese singers Category:Actors
title: Myriam Fares
